title: HortPark: A Horticultural Oasis for All Ages
blurb: Discover nature's beauty at HortPark's themed gardens.
description: HortPark is a 9-hectare park that serves as a one-stop gardening resource hub. It features themed gardens such as the Therapeutic Garden, showcasing plants that promote healing and well-being, and the Butterfly Garden, attracting various butterfly species. The park also offers educational workshops and gardening demonstrations for both adults and children. Families can enjoy leisurely strolls along the park's trails, explore the playground, and have picnics amidst the lush greenery. HortPark aims to inspire and educate the community about horticulture, providing a serene and family-friendly environment for all to appreciate nature's wonders. The park is designed to be accessible and enjoyable for visitors of all ages, with various amenities and facilities to enhance their experience. It's a great place for families to spend quality time together while learning about plants and gardening.
Keyword_tag: gardening, nature, park, family, outdoor, playground, education

title: HortPark: Gardening Resource Hub and Nature Spot
blurb: One-stop hub for gardening, recreation, and education.
description: HortPark is a 10.7-hectare park serving as a one-stop gardening resource hub. It offers a variety of gardening-related, recreational, educational, research, and retail activities. The park features themed gardens, bee-friendly plants, and various species of bees and butterflies. Visitors can explore the Event Lawn, themed gardens, and trails. Note that Forest Walk is closed from 17 January 2025 due to slope failure. Alternative routes are available via Depot Road or Telok Blangah Heights. The park is wheelchair accessible and elderly-friendly, providing a serene environment for nature lovers and gardening enthusiasts.
Keyword_tag: gardening, nature, park, outdoor, recreation, education, trails, bee garden, butterfly garden

title: HortPark: Gardening Resource & Recreational Hub
blurb: One-stop hub for gardening, recreation, education.
description: HortPark is a one-stop gardening resource hub where visitors can find a variety of gardening-related, recreational, educational, research, and retail activities. It is part of the Southern Ridges, which is part of the Labrador Nature Park Network. The visitor services are available from 9am to 12pm, 1pm to 5pm (Mon to Fri) and 8.30am to 12.30pm (Sat, Sun, PH). HortPark provides a space for the community to come together and enjoy the beauty of nature. It offers various themed gardens, lifestyle corners, and educational displays, making it an ideal destination for families and gardening enthusiasts alike. Visitors can explore the different facets of horticulture and learn about sustainable gardening practices. The park also hosts workshops and events.
datetime_display: 9am to 12pm, 1pm to 5pm (Mon to Fri) and 8.30am to 12.30pm (Sat, Sun, PH)
Keyword_tag: gardening, recreation, education, retail, nature, park

blurb: Explore themed gardens offering unique perspectives.

title: HortPark: Plants and Animals Exploration
blurb: Discover diverse flora and fauna at HortPark.
description: Explore the rich biodiversity of HortPark, home to a variety of plant and animal species. Wander through themed gardens showcasing different plant families and learn about their ecological importance. Observe native birds, butterflies, and other wildlife in their natural habitat. Engage in educational activities and guided tours to deepen your understanding of the natural world. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts seeking a tranquil escape and a chance to connect with the environment. Discover the beauty and importance of plants and animals in this urban oasis. HortPark offers a unique opportunity to learn about Singapore's natural heritage.
Keyword_tag: Plants, Animals, Nature, Gardens, Wildlife, Exploration, Biodiversity

title: HortPark: Nature, Gardening & Lifestyle Destination
blurb: Explore themed gardens, trails, and diverse flora & fauna.
description: HortPark is a 9.6-hectare park that serves as a gardening resource hub. It features themed gardens like the Bee and Butterfly Garden, showcasing bee-friendly plants and various butterfly species. Visitors can explore trails and discover plants such as the Indian Snakeweed, Red Leea, and Rose Myrtle. The park also highlights the Gelam tree with its unique bark and bottle brush-like flowers. It's a place where families can connect with nature, learn about gardening, and enjoy the outdoors. The park offers educational opportunities and a tranquil environment for all ages to appreciate the beauty of horticulture and biodiversity. Perfect for families and nature enthusiasts.
Keyword_tag: gardening, nature, plants, flowers, bees, butterflies, trails, outdoor, family-friendly

HortPark offers educational and recreational opportunities for families and nature enthusiasts. It's a great place to learn about horticulture and enjoy the beauty of nature. The park provides a serene environment for relaxation and exploration, with diverse flora and fauna to discover. Perfect for families seeking an outdoor adventure and educational experience.

The park is designed to be family-friendly, offering a peaceful retreat for both adults and children to enjoy the beauty of the outdoors. It's a perfect spot for a quiet afternoon or a leisurely stroll, allowing families to connect with nature and each other in a tranquil setting. The open lawn is ideal for picnics and outdoor activities, making it a versatile space for various recreational pursuits. title: HortPark: Nature Playgarden and Therapeutic Garden
blurb: Explore nature playgarden and therapeutic garden at HortPark.
description: HortPark features a Nature Playgarden designed to encourage outdoor play for preschoolers, fostering creativity and motor skills. The Therapeutic Garden enhances mental well-being through evidence-based design. Additionally, there are playgrounds with sandpit, slides, kiddie rides, and a space net for climbing. HortPark offers various venues for booking, suitable for organized tours and group activities. Vineyard restaurant is also located within the park. It's a family-friendly environment where children can engage in open-ended play and exercise their creativity.
Keyword_tag: Nature playgarden, therapeutic garden, playgrounds, outdoor play, family-friendly, kids activities

title: HortPark: Nature Playgarden and Playgrounds
blurb: Outdoor play, creativity, and motor skills development.
description: HortPark offers a variety of amenities including a Nature Playgarden designed to encourage outdoor play for preschoolers, fostering creativity and motor skills. The park also features three playgrounds: one with a sandpit, one with slides and kiddie rides, and one with a space net for climbing. Additionally, there is a Therapeutic Garden designed to enhance mental well-being. HortPark provides various venues for booking, suitable for organized tours and group activities, making it an ideal destination for families and children seeking outdoor recreation and educational experiences.
Keyword_tag: Nature playgarden, playgrounds, outdoor play, therapeutic garden, family activities

title: HortPark: Gardening and Nature Activities
blurb: Explore gardening and nature with volunteer opportunities.
description: HortPark offers various gardening and nature-related activities. Individuals interested in gardening and nature can sign up as volunteers. Corporate organizations and schools are also welcome to join as volunteers. Download the NEAR mobile app to find routes via park connectors or trails. Subscribe to the NParks Newsletter for updates. HortPark provides opportunities for learning about horticulture and enjoying the natural environment. It's a great place for families to connect with nature and participate in gardening activities. The park features themed gardens, educational displays, and spaces for community involvement in green initiatives. HortPark aims to promote gardening and environmental awareness among visitors of all ages.
